Package calculator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calculator
    Creates the User Interface, and ActionListeners for the Calculator and displays them on the screen, this class calls upon Logic.java to do the arithmetic for each of the buttons and actions
    Logic
    Creates the logic and arithmetic for the calculator, each method is called from Calculator.java to manipulate the number and make the buttons and numbers perform as a calculator should, numbers are passed in and out then stored in strings to be printed out in the UI, which Calculator.java controls.
